work_with_me_opening: I am intrested in data-driven studies for social policy design and the usage of socio-demographic data in clinican treatment management.

projects.name: Socio-Demographic Factors Influencing Cancer Screening Behaviors and Their Usage For Policy Design Using Machine Learning
projects.description: In this study, we first collect a dataset about the socio-demographic, economic, and healthcare preferences with cancer screening behavior. Next, we leverage ML techniques to examine the socio-demographic determinants of cancer screening behaviors. Using the obtained model and a in silico simulation, we examine personalized policy design for policymakers.

projects.name: Main PhD studies
projects.description: In this line of work, we focus on bladder cancer models from socio-demographic point of view and using data science methods.
